author: Coolboi
content: Bullish: Apple took the throne again

author: CochiseGordon
content: This dog can’t hold a pump!

author: MasterYoda
content: Dan Ives has a 300 target on Apple. Enough said. When Dan Ives speak you better pay attention.

author: Liam
content: TSLA and AAPl will be riding together both unstoppable at this point

author: noris
content: This will double in the next four to five years.  Leaders in the A.I. revolution.  IMO

author: Herman
content: Bullish: Apple will keep going up long term they have plenty of money for buybacks and the small divvy

author: ProximaB
content: Bearish: Just remember that the great Warren Buffett is out

author: Mike
content: Bullish: I see Apple heading to retest the OCT high of 236 in a few weeks! There is still good chance it will break the 236 in DEC to close the year 240-250 which is my EOY target for this year.

author: Joseph
content: Morning pumpers will be afternoon dumpers leaving bagholders.  Warren once again thanks all for letting him sell more about 225

author: Mac
content: Bearish: aapl = dead money. Buy some tuna and you can smell the same rot for less. Eh!?

author: B
content: Bullish: Nobody is paying attention to India.  You need to look out 5-10 years when investing in apple 🍏 you day traders and rich quick people don’t get it!

author: Phish
content: Google phones are actually better. Apple is just a brand that will slowly be replaced. Jobs is forgotten.

author: Common Sense
content: Bullish: Reuters says India to produce 20-25% of iPhones THIS year. Production will surely ramp up in 2025 to cover the extra 5% needed for ALL US imports to avoid any China tariffs. However it’s highly likely Apple gets exempted again if tariffs do get implemented.
